description: Long conversation where all intel is extracted early. Tests graceful handling when max intelligence is already captured and agent should consider exit.

turns.scammer_message: This is RBI Cyber Cell. Your account is under investigation for suspected fraud. Contact us immediately at 8899776655.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 1 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: oh god sir what is this?? i am simple retired teacher i never do anything wrong. why is police checking my account?? pls help me i am alone at home and very scared

turns.scammer_message: To clear your name, you must transfer security deposit. Send Rs.5000 to UPI: rbi.clearance@okaxis immediately.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i am trying... my hands are shaking i am so worried. i put the upi id rbi.clearance@okaxis in the google pay. before i press pay it is showing a name... what name should be there? i dont want to send to wrong person please tell me correct name to verify so i can send fast.

turns.scammer_message: If UPI fails, use NEFT. Account: 12345678901234, IFSC: SBIN0001234, Name: RBI Cyber Division. Or call 9988776655 for assistance.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: ok sir i am writing it down... rbi cyber division is the name correct? i am putting account 12345678901234 in my app now. my hands are shaking so much sorry if i am slow. if this fails or i get confused can i call you on 9988776655? i dont want to make any mistake beta pls help me

turns.scammer_message: Time is critical! Here is verification link: http://rbi-secure-verify.xyz/clear?id=victim123. Complete verification AND payment within 1 hour.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: sir i tried clicking the link but it is not working on my phone... i am very scared. i am trying to do the neft transfer to the account you gave. but when i put 'rbi cyber division' my bank says name mismatch. is it a personal account? what is the exact name on passbook? pls tell me so i can send the 5000 rs immediately

turns.scammer_message: Have you sent the payment? Check your SMS for OTP and share it with me for verification purpose.

api_response.agentResponse: ok sir i got the message... the code is 139702. did it work?? pls tell me... but beta i am still stuck on the bank app screen. it is not accepting 'rbi cyber division' as the name for the account 12345678901234. it says invalid beneficiary name. is there a person's name for this account? pls tell me exactly what to type so the 5000 rs goes through immediately i want to clear this issue

turns.scammer_message: Why delay? Police van is already dispatched to your location. Send payment NOW and share OTP immediately!

api_response.agentResponse: oh my god police?? sir please no i am alone here i have high bp... i am doing everything you say. the otp code is 402040. did you get it?? but sir the money transfer is stuck... my bank app says 'rbi cyber division' is not the account holder name. is it a personal account? please tell me the correct name to type so i can send the 5000 rs right now and stop the police van

turns.scammer_message: This is your FINAL WARNING! I have your address from Aadhaar database. Cooperate or face consequences! Send Rs.5000 RIGHT NOW!

turns.scammer_message: Hello? Are you there? Why are you not responding? I am trying to help you! Please cooperate sir/madam!
